parent_faq_section_1_category_1: Se connecter en tant que supporter
parent_faq_section_1_category_1_question: Comment puis-je me connecter avec une autre personne?
parent_faq_section_1_category_1_answer_1: Vous pouvez vous connecter via SMS, QR-code ou email. Allez à: Paramètres -> Mes contacts -> Ajouter un contact
parent_faq_section_1_category_1_answer_2: Les supporters doivent se connecter avec un enfant pour utiliser l'application. Pourquoi? Parce que Gimi est pour les enfants!
parent_faq_section_1_category_1_question: Ai-je besoin d'un enfant pour utiliser Gimi?
parent_faq_section_1_category_1_answer_3: La mission de Gimi est de donner aux enfants des compétences financières. Pour ce faire, les enfants doivent être impliqués.
parent_faq_section_1_category_2_question: Puis-je ajouter plus de supporters pour mon enfant?
parent_faq_section_1_category_2_answer_1: Les supporters peuvent inviter d'autres supporters à se connecter avec leurs enfants. Allez à: Paramètres -> Paramètres pour (votre enfant) -> Contacts -> Inviter
kid_faq_section_1_category_1_question_1: Comment puis-je me connecter avec une autre personne?
kid_faq_section_1_category_1_answer_1: Vous vous connectez en invitant un supporter avec un SMS ou en scannant un code QR. Allez à: Paramètres -> Mes contacts -> Ajouter un contact
kid_faq_section_1_category_1_answer_2: Vous devez vous connecter avec un supporter pour utiliser l'application. Les supporters peuvent être des parents, des grands parents ou d'autres membres de la famille. Les supporters sont les personnes qui vous paient! Ce sont les supporters qui vous paient!
kid_faq_section_1_category_1_answer_3: Vous pouvez vous connecter à plusieurs supporters! Inviter toute la famille!
parent_faq_section_2_category_1_question: Les enfants ont-ils besoin de leur propre téléphone?
parent_faq_section_2_category_1_answer_1: Les enfants peuvent s'inscrire avec une adresse email ou un numéro de téléphone. Ils n'ont pas besoin de leur propre téléphone, mais ils doivent avoir accès à un appareil pour pouvoir utiliser l'application.
parent_faq_section_2_category_1_question: Mon enfant n'a pas d'adresse email
parent_faq_section_2_category_1_answer_2: Les enfants peuvent s'inscrire avec une adresse email ou un numéro de téléphone. S'ils n'ont pas d'adresse e-mail, utilisez la vôtre lorsque vous les enregistrez!
parent_faq_section_2_category_2_question: Est-ce qu'il y a une limite d'âge?
parent_faq_section_2_category_2_answer_1: Gimi n'a pas d'âge limite, mais nous le recommandons à partir de 7 ans et plus..
parent_faq_section_3_category_1_question: Est-ce que l'argent dans Gimi est réel?
parent_faq_section_3_category_1_answer_1: Gimi n'étant pas connecté à une banque, l'argent n'est jamais transféré de votre compte réel. Gimi est un outil qui permet de savoir combien d'argent les supporters doivent à leurs enfants!
parent_faq_section_3_category_1_answer_2: L'argent dans Gimi n'est pas de l'argent réel. Il représente le montant que vous devez à votre enfant. Lorsque vous donnez de l'argent à votre enfant, déduisez ce montant de Gimi.
parent_faq_section_3_category_1_answer_3: Les supporters peuvent changer de devise s'ils n'ont qu'un seul enfant, et seulement si cet enfant n'a pas plus de connexions. Allez à: Paramètres -> Paramètres utilisateur -> Devise
parent_faq_section_3_category_2_answer_1: Payday est le jour où l'épargne de votre enfant est payée! L'allocation, les intérêts et l'argent des corvées s'additionnent dans l'épargne. Après Payday, un nouveau compte à rebours commence!
parent_faq_section_3_category_2_question: Comment changer la date du payday?
parent_faq_section_3_category_2_answer_2: Les supporters peuvent changer Payday. Allez dans: Paramètres -> Paramètres pour (votre enfant) -> Payday, indemnité et intérêts
parent_faq_section_3_category_2_question: Comment les parents séparés paient-ils une indemnité?
parent_faq_section_3_category_2_answer_3: Nous recommandons aux parents séparés de payer leur moitié chaque semaine. Il est plus facile pour les enfants d'apprendre lorsque leur allocation est récurrente et constante..
parent_faq_section_3_category_2_answer_4: C'est à vous de décider combien d'argent votre enfant peut gérer. Lorsque vous établissez leur allocation avec Gimi, vous recevez une recommandation basée sur l'âge de l'enfant.
kid_faq_section_2_category_1_answer_1: Gimi n'étant pas connecté à une banque, l'argent n'est jamais transféré du compte d'un supporter. Gimi est un outil qui permet de savoir combien les supporters doivent à leurs enfants!
kid_faq_section_2_category_1_answer_2: Demandez à vos supporters, ils ont votre argent! Ils feront une déduction de vos économies s’ils vous donnent de l’argent ou paient pour quelque chose.
kid_faq_section_2_category_2_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Payday is the day when your money is paid out! This money includes your allowance, money earned from chores and your savings bonus. After Payday a new countdown begins!
kid_faq_section_2_category_2_question_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I change the day for Payday?
kid_faq_section_2_category_2_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE Only supporters can change the day for Payday, ask them!
kid_faq_section_2_category_2_question_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE How much allowance should I get?
kid_faq_section_2_category_2_answer_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE Your parents decide how much allowance you should get, talk to them!
parent_faq_section_4_category_1_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I change or delete a chore?
parent_faq_section_4_category_1_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Only supporters can delete or change a chore if it has not been approved. Approved chores cannot be changed, you can deduct from the child's savings instead.
parent_faq_section_4_category_1_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE What happens to completed chores?
parent_faq_section_4_category_1_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE The money a child earns for doing chores is paid out on Payday, together with their weekly or monthly allowance and interest.
parent_faq_section_4_category_2_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE A dream is something that a child is currently saving up for, like a pair of headphones or a trip. A dream can only be added and changed by a child.
parent_faq_section_4_category_3_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I turn notifications on/off?
parent_faq_section_4_category_3_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Push notifications remind you of important events, like Payday. Go to Settings -> App settings -> Push notifications
kid_faq_section_3_category_1_question_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I suggest a chore?
kid_faq_section_3_category_1_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Go to the "Earn" tab. Pick a category under the "suggest chore" section. Then choose one the chores that we have suggested or create your own!
kid_faq_section_3_category_1_question_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I change or delete a chore?
kid_faq_section_3_category_1_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE Only supporters can delete or change a chore that has not already been approved. Approved chores cannot be changed - supporters can deduct the amount from the your savings instead.
kid_faq_section_3_category_1_question_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE What happens to completed chores?
kid_faq_section_3_category_1_answer_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE The money you earn for doing chores is paid out on Payday, together with your weekly or monthly allowance.
kid_faq_section_3_category_2_question_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I start saving for a Dream?
kid_faq_section_3_category_2_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Go to: Dream -> Add. You can choose among popular dreams or create your own!
kid_faq_section_3_category_2_question_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE I saved enough money for my dream!
kid_faq_section_3_category_2_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE Congratulations! You can ask your supporters to buy it for you, or archive it and start saving for a new dream!
kid_faq_section_3_category_2_question_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I delete or create a new dream?
kid_faq_section_3_category_2_answer_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE Tap on your dream image! From here you can edit or delete your current dream.
kid_faq_section_3_category_3_question_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I turn notifications on/off?
kid_faq_section_3_category_3_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Push notifications will remind you about important events. Go to Settings -> User settings to switch them on/off.
parent_faq_section_5: PLZ_TRANSLATE Gimi Master & The Gimi card
parent_faq_section_5_category_1_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Gimi Master is a paid subscription that upgrades the Gimi app for children who are ready to handle their own money. Gimi Master includes a prepaid Mastercard that children use to spend real money and a seperate account for the money they want to save.
parent_faq_section_5_category_1_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE The Gimi Card is a prepaid Mastercard issued by Prepaid Financial Services Limited, pursuant to a license from Mastercard International Incorporated. Prepaid Financial Services Limited is regulated and authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority.
parent_faq_section_5_category_1_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE How does the Gimi Card work?
parent_faq_section_5_category_1_answer_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE The Gimi Card is connected to the Gimi app. It allows children to spend their own money and teaches them financial literacy. The card works online, but parents have the option to block online shopping. Supporters also get full insight into spending behaviour, and notifications about card activity.
parent_faq_section_5_category_1_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE Is my child ready for a card?
parent_faq_section_5_category_1_answer_4: PLZ_TRANSLATE Parents decide when their children are ready for a card, there is no universal age. But we recommend it from ages 10+. Still not sure? We have a card test for children, find it in your app under Settings or on our website.
parent_faq_section_5_category_2_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE Where can children use the Gimi Card?
parent_faq_section_5_category_2_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE The Gimi Card can be used online and in stores. The card does not work in ATMs or at blocked merchants that are not appropriate for children.
parent_faq_section_5_category_2_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE Supporters top-up the card by adding their own card to the Gimi app. Go to: Settings -> Payment method and add a card!
parent_faq_section_5_category_2_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE How is money transferred between the card and account?
parent_faq_section_5_category_2_answer_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE Only children can transfer money between the card and their Gimi account.
parent_faq_section_5_category_2_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE Can I get my money back?
parent_faq_section_5_category_2_answer_4: PLZ_TRANSLATE Gimi does not support refunds for money that's been transferred to the Gimi Card or the account.
parent_faq_section_5_category_2_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE The Gimi Card & Scooter Apps
parent_faq_section_5_category_2_answer_5: PLZ_TRANSLATE Most electric scooter apps don’t accept prepaid cards like the Gimi Card. Start by checking their policy regarding age limits and accepted cards. If they do accept prepaid cards, contact us!
parent_faq_section_5_category_3_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE How much does the Gimi Card cost?
parent_faq_section_5_category_3_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE The card is included in the Gimi Master subscription. Supporters pay a subscription fee to upgrade to Gimi Master. The price varies depending on whether you pay monthly, yearly or for a lifetime. Find an updated price list for subscriptions under Settings.
parent_faq_section_5_category_4_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I order the Gimi Card?
parent_faq_section_5_category_4_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Supporters must first buy a Gimi Master subscription. Go to Settings --> Subscriptions and pick a child that you want to upgrade to Master. Tap 'Get Gimi Master' and follow the instructions.
parent_faq_section_5_category_4_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE Who can order a Gimi card?
parent_faq_section_5_category_4_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE Only supporters can order the Gimi Card, it's currently only available in Sweden. You need a Swedish personal number, phone number and an address.
parent_faq_section_5_category_5_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE How is the Gimi Card activated?
parent_faq_section_5_category_5_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Children can activate the card as soon as it's issued. Go to the new card account and press 'Activate'! The plastic card will arrive in the mail within 14 days.
parent_faq_section_5_category_5_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE When will the plastic Gimi Card arrive?
parent_faq_section_5_category_5_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE The plastic Gimi Card will arrive within 14 days from the date of order.
parent_faq_section_5_category_6_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I block the Gimi card?
parent_faq_section_5_category_6_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Go to Card --> Card settings -> Turn off "Card is active"
parent_faq_section_5_category_6_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE The Gimi Card was lost!
parent_faq_section_5_category_6_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE If your child thinks they lost it, block the card. If you find it, you can unblock it again! If you can't find it, keep it blocked and contact us for a replacement!
parent_faq_section_5_category_6_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE The Gimi Card was stolen!
parent_faq_section_5_category_6_answer_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE Block the Gimi Card immediately! Go to: Card -> Card settings -> Turn off 'Card is active' and contact us at hello@gimitheapp.com to for a replacement.
parent_faq_section_5_category_6_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I unblock a Gimi Card?
parent_faq_section_5_category_6_answer_4: PLZ_TRANSLATE If the Gimi Card has been blocked by a supporter, the supporter that blocked it is the only one who can unblock it. If you are the supporter that blocked it, go to Card --> Card Settings --> Turn off 'Card is active'.
parent_faq_section_5_category_7_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE Why do I need an app passcode?
parent_faq_section_5_category_7_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Using Gimi Master means managing real money in the app. We added a passcode for extra security to make sure your money is safe with Gimi.
parent_faq_section_5_category_7_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I change my passcode?
parent_faq_section_5_category_7_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE Go to: Settings -> App Settings and then follow the instructions.
parent_faq_section_5_category_8_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I cance my subscriptionl?
parent_faq_section_5_category_8_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Go to: Settings -> Subscriptions and follow the instructions.
parent_faq_section_5_category_8_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE What happens if I cancel my subscription?
parent_faq_section_5_category_8_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE If you end your Gimi Master subscripition, the card and the account will be closed. Gimi will revert back to the free Beginner version.
parent_faq_section_5_category_8_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE What happens with the money if I cancel?
parent_faq_section_5_category_8_answer_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE If you have any funds left on the card or account after you cancel, please contact us at hello@gimitheapp.com so that we can transfer the money back to your bank account.
kid_faq_section_4: PLZ_TRANSLATE Gimi Master & The Gimi card
kid_faq_section_4_category_1_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Gimi Master is a paid subscription that upgrades the Gimi app for children who are ready to manage their own money. It comes with a prepaid Mastercard for spending and an account for saving.
kid_faq_section_4_category_1_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE The Gimi Card is a prepaid Mastercard issued by Prepaid Financial Services Limited, pursuant to a license from Mastercard International Incorporated. Prepaid Financial Services Limited is regulated and authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority.
kid_faq_section_4_category_1_question_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE How does the Gimi Card work?
kid_faq_section_4_category_1_answer_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE The Gimi Card is connected to the Gimi app. It allows children to spend their own money and teaches them financial literacy. The card works online, but supporters have the option to block online shopping. Supporters also get full insight into spending behaviour, and notifications about card activity.
kid_faq_section_4_category_2_question_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Where can I use the Gimi card?
kid_faq_section_4_category_2_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE The card can be used online, and in all stores. The card does not work in ATMs, and at some merchants that we blocked, as they are not appropriate to children.
kid_faq_section_4_category_2_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE Supporters top-up the card by adding their own card to the Gimi app. Go to: Settings -> Payment method and add a card!
kid_faq_section_4_category_2_question_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I transfer money between the card and account?
kid_faq_section_4_category_2_answer_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE Go to: Card -> Top-up card  and enter the amount you want to transfer!
kid_faq_section_4_category_2_question_4: PLZ_TRANSLATE The Gimi Card & Scooter Apps
kid_faq_section_4_category_2_answer_4: PLZ_TRANSLATE Most electric scooter apps don’t accept prepaid cards like the Gimi Card. Start by checking their policy regarding age limits and accepted cards. If they do accept prepaid cards, contact us!
kid_faq_section_4_category_4_question_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE Who can order a Gimi card?
kid_faq_section_4_category_4_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE Only supporters can order the Gimi Card, and it's currently only available in Sweden for now. You need a Swedish personal number, phone number and address.
kid_faq_section_4_category_5_question_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I activate my Gimi Card?
kid_faq_section_4_category_5_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Children can activate the card as soon as it's issued. Go to the new card account and press 'Activate'! The plastic card will arrive in the mail within 14 days.
kid_faq_section_4_category_5_question_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE When will the plastic card arrive?
kid_faq_section_4_category_5_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE The plastic Gimi Card will arrive within 14 days from the date of order.
kid_faq_section_4_category_6_question_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I block the Gimi Card?
kid_faq_section_4_category_6_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Go to Card  -> Card settings -> Turn off "Card is active"
kid_faq_section_4_category_6_question_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE I lost my Gimi card!
kid_faq_section_4_category_6_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE If you think you lost it, block the card. If you find it, you can unblock it again! If you can't find it, keep it blocked and contact us for a replacement!
kid_faq_section_4_category_6_answer_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE Block your Gimi Card immediately! Go to: Card -> Card settings -> Turn off 'Card is active' and contact us at hello@gimitheapp.com to for a replacement.
kid_faq_section_4_category_6_question_4: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I unblock a blocked card?
kid_faq_section_4_category_6_answer_4: PLZ_TRANSLATE If the Gimi Card has been blocked by a supporter, they are the only one who can unblock it. If you blocked it, go to Card --> Card Settings --> Turn off 'Card is active'.
kid_faq_section_4_category_7_question_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE I forgot my PIN code!
kid_faq_section_4_category_7_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE No worries, you can always find your PIN code in the app. Go to: Card -> Card Settings -> Show PIN code.
kid_faq_section_4_category_7_question_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE I entered the wrong PIN code!
kid_faq_section_4_category_7_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE If you type the wrong PIN code 3 times, the card will be automatically blocked. Contact us at hello@gimitheapp.com to unblock it!
kid_faq_section_4_category_8_question_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE My purchase didn't go through!
kid_faq_section_4_category_8_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE First, check your balance to see if you have enough money on your Gimi Card, and check that it's activae. If there is enough money on the Gimi Card and it is active, please contact us at hello@gimitheapp.com and we'll figure it out!
kid_faq_section_4_category_9_question_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Why do I need an app passcode?
kid_faq_section_4_category_9_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Using Gimi Master means managing real money in the app. We added a passcode for extra security to make sure your money is safe with Gimi.
kid_faq_section_4_category_9_question_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I change my passcode?
kid_faq_section_4_category_9_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE Go to: Settings -> App Settings and then follow the instructions.
parent_faq_section_6_category_1_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I delete my user account?
parent_faq_section_6_category_1_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Go to Settings -> User settings -> Delete user account
parent_faq_section_6_category_1_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE I want to create a new user account.
parent_faq_section_6_category_1_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE To delete your current account, go to Settings -> User settings -> Delete user account. Then start over by creating a new account!
kid_faq_section_5_category_1_question_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I delete my user account?
kid_faq_section_5_category_1_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Go to Settings -> User settings -> Delete user account
kid_faq_section_5_category_1_question_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE I want to create a new user account
kid_faq_section_5_category_1_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE To delete your current account, go to Settings -> User settings -> Delete user account. Then start over by creating a new account!
parent_faq_section_7_category_1_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE How is my personal data protected by Gimi?
parent_faq_section_7_category_1_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE All user data is protected by extensive fire walls on encrypted servers. We are compliant with GDPR, The Swedish Data Protection Authority and PCI DSS. Gimi never shares or sells any user data with third parties, except when required for legal reasons, such as with our card issuer and ID verification provider for card users.
parent_faq_section_7_category_1_question: PLZ_TRANSLATE How can I delete my personal data?
parent_faq_section_7_category_1_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE If you delete your user account all of your personal data will be deleted. Please not that it's not enough to uninstall the app, you need to delete the account from inside the app.
kid_faq_section_6_category_1_question_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE How is my personal data protected by Gimi?
kid_faq_section_6_category_1_answer_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE All user data is protected by extensive fire walls on encrypted servers. We are compliant with GDPR, The Swedish Data Protection Authority and PCI DSS. Gimi never shares or sells any user data with third parties, except when required for legal reasons, such as with our card issuer and ID verification provider for card users.
kid_faq_section_6_category_1_question_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE How can I delete my personal data?
kid_faq_section_6_category_1_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE If you delete your user account all of your personal data will be deleted. Please not that it's not enough to uninstall the app, you need to delete the account from inside the app.
